points.text: Developed a Helpdesk Ticket Application using Next.js through streamlined workflows and intuitive UI

Integrated an e-signature workflow into the CRM, enabling senders to specify signature locations and request signatures via email. Implemented automated notifications for each signature, with the final signed PDF sent to the requester and updated in the CRM.
Contributed to the development of a Helpdesk CRM application enabling customers to track their services and status
Leveraged Next.js to implement event tracking, user analytics, and UI experiments to improve analytics using GrowthBook, Elasticsearch, and Moengage
Mentored and guided 4+ interns in the team, providing guidance that resulted in improved performance and professional development.
Developed 4 critical modules (Job Invoice, Spare Order, Service Reminder, PDF Invoice) in Autoinn project
Implemented maintainable business logic adhering to best practices while working on the Vehicle Insurance microservice at Digit Insurance (Contract).
Contributed to the development of a Vehicle Insurance Policy API Service and Phonepe integration, at Godigit Insurance Company
Spearheaded the integration of Marketplace and Logistics APIs with leading platforms like Flipkart, Wish, and shipping partners DHL and FedEx, driving logistics operations.
Worked on Pricing Service implemented in Flask framework, integrating with RabbitMQ events to automate pricing related tasks.
Acquired skills in Unit Testing, Debugging, API integration, clean code and best practices.
